infos.value: His Majesty...King Robb still has faith in Schuzelt. However...
King Muraga flew into a rage when he defended Schuzelt.
He spoke of treacheryâ€”a secret alliance with Leonis in an attempt to destroy Fennes.
Ridiculous...
He took it as a great offense after having married his dearest daughter to the House of Hourne.
King Robb could not utter a word in kind.
And so he offered Naiah as proof of his loyalty?
No. Without so much as a word to King Robb, King Muraga gave the command to a shinobi in his charge...
There can be no mercy!
Perhaps this very upheaval is what Fennes was hoping for?
Schuzelt... You are turning your blade against Fennes.
That was precisely Muraga's goal. Do you not understand?
Father will not be able to oppose Muraga.
And to add insult to injury, now Muraga plans to get rid of me as well...
His last breath will be drawn before my blade. I swear it.
Even if by doing so, you destroy our homeland?
Forgive me for speaking so plainly.
There is no fault in speaking of what has already passed. But alas...
We will not raise our swords against Leonis.
Leonis is the enemy, my lady.
Should you disobey me, you will die. Understood?
...You have my loyalty, my lady.
That mangy Muraga... I'd heard tell of his savagery, but never his wits.
We must prepare ourselves for the worst.
Mont...
